1300480.name: The Cleanup Crew
1300480.description:
Welcome Cleaners to your brand new, totally non-dangerous, prospective career! As part of the Cleanup Crew for <REDACTED> you are designated to go in after we have detected an entrant dying to an anomaly and retrieve vital components for us. These components will then be re-used on new entrants as part of the <REDACTED> Program. For the most part, you should be safe as any anomaly that has killed an entrant will more than likely ignore you. In case of emergencies where an anomaly does attempt to attack you, there are designated safe rooms which are safe against most anomalies. These safe rooms can sometimes contain vital equipment to ensure you continue on through the <REDACTED> Rooms, gathering these vital components for <REDACTED> Company. In case of injuries, dismemberment, or death: the <REDACTED> Company is not to be deemed liable as part of your contract you have officially signed when onboarding into the <REDACTED> Company. In case of any one of the above occurring and vital components are lost in the <REDACTED> Rooms, a new Cleanup Crew will be sent in to retrieve them.

Your job (in your new career) is to enter the LEVELS for Cleanup. During Cleanups you are to retrieve Components for The <REDACTED> Company and store them in Safe Rooms. The <REDACTED> Company is generous, giving you monetary compensation for each Component retrieved and sometimes providing Equipment to continue on.

What can you do with that lovely monetary compensation? Why spend it back on new and unique company equipment! Upgrade various aspects of yourself such as Movement Speed, Health, Stamina or purchase Equipment to help you out in your traversals to retrieve Components! The possibilities are endless!

But... be careful...

You are truly never alone. While you may be with your Crew exploring around, in the LEVELS are The Anomalies, various creatures who range in what they can do as well as their threat level. As you progress through the levels their threat level and the amount of them increase, you cannot fight them, but you can attempt to outrun, evade, or escape to The <REDACTED> Company's Safe Rooms. Patented to keep you safe. All Rights Reserved.

Your Crew is your backbone, play up to 4 players total or bear it solo. The choice is yours. While the game is designed for up to 4 players, you can tough it out solo, as a duo, or with your trio as well with no penalty. The <REDACTED> Company just wants it's components back after all.

The only other objective? Survive.
1300480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
